snippet: In an 1995 interview, Mr. Bloch spoke of his passions — to entertain people and to be an activist and environmentalist.
abstract: Larry Bloch, who built the Wetlands Preserve in TriBeCa into an influential rock club and a hub of environmental activism, dies at age 59.
lead_paragraph: In an 1995 interview, Mr. Bloch spoke of his passions — to entertain people and to be an activist and environmentalist.

headline.seo: Larry Bloch, Who Opened Wetlands Club, Dies at 59
headline.main: Larry Bloch,  Who Built the Wetlands Club, Dies at 59
headline.print_headline: Larry Bloch, 59, Built the Wetlands Club
